title: Takes a very long time to begin downloading a file
content: I have a new, updated firefox on a faster computer. However, I've notice that many files, especially videos, while they download at normal speed, can take over 10 minutes to actually START downloading. It also seems to vary based on whether I'm downloading from a download link, a page like mediafire, using "save video as", etc. It will just stay on the screen, with the little dot on its' tab going back and forth.
creator: goldbergl1

title: Out bound malicious web site blocked by Malwarebytes
content:
I keep getting warnings from my Malwarebytes Antivirus as to "Malvertising, Domain: cdn28786515.ahacdn.me". Here is the report from my AV:

Malwarebytes www.malwarebytes.com

-Log Details- Protection Event Date: 7/12/23 Protection Event Time: 6:24 AM Log File: 0f3984c2-2042-11ee-b29f-088fc348e3bf.json

-Software Information- Version: 4.5.26.259 Components Version: 1.0.1976 Update Package Version: 1.0.72263 License: Premium

-System Information- OS: Windows 10 (Build 19044.2965) CPU: x64 File System: NTFS User: System

-Blocked Website Details- Malicious Website: 1 , C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe, Blocked, -1, -1, 0.0.0, ,

-Website Data- Category: Malvertising Domain: cdn28786515.ahacdn.me IP Address: 45.133.44.53 Port: 443 Type: Outbound File: C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe

(end)

Can you please explain how I can get rid of this "Malvertising"? I do not have this on Chrome or Brave browsers although Firefox is my default browser. Thanks in Advance Al J
creator: aljohnson125
